name: Nikita

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara:
Certified UX/UI Designer with over two years of 
experience in UI development, specializing in startups. 
Excels in crafting compelling user experiences and 
dedicated to continuous learning, my journey has led me 
to discover a genuine passion for UI/UX Design. The 
focus is on making digital experiences easier and simpler 
for users

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Collaborated closely with the UX/UI team of craft on organization-level Storybook, a vital  tool serving as a development environment for testing UI components in isolation  I applied my design expertise to create web screens for internal applications, prioritizing a  seamless and user-friendly experience

Worked on responsive web Application development using React.js, with MUI library/  Bootstrap, also collaborated on all stages of systems development life-cycle, from  requirement  gathering to production releases  Worked on developing the websites and POCâ€™s with CMS  Worked on developing applications using Strapi as backend and Vite + React as fronten  Collaborated with a UI/UX team and development team on the development of storybook  library, a pivotal project aimed at maintaining organizational standards.
